com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist

Class ContentLengthInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist.ContentLengthInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ContentLengthInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    Decorator for InputStream. Provides possibility to return defined stream length by available() method.
    Since:
    1.9.1
